message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_SUB>を押す<KEYM><KC HOLD_BOW>を押して構えてから<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>で構え切替（初期設定の場合）
message.translation: <PADM>Press <KC WEAPON_SUB>.<KEYM>Press and hold <KC HOLD_BOW>, then <ICON MOUSE_WHL_4> (default setting) to switch stance.

message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_SUB>を押しながら右スティックを倒す<KEYM>闘波の構え中にマウス移動
message.translation: <PADM>Press and hold <KC WEAPON_SUB>, then move the right stick<KEYM>During Seeker Stance, move the mouse</KEYM>.

message.original: 闘波の構え中に<KC SHOOT>を押す
敵を狙って集中しジャストタイミングで矢を放つ
message.translation: Focus concentration on enemies and fire arrows with perfect timing.

message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押す<KEYM><KC HOLD_BOW>を押して構えてから<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>で構え切替（初期設定の場合）
message.translation: <PADM>Press <KC WEAPON_MAIN>.<KEYM>Press and hold <KC HOLD_BOW>, then <ICON MOUSE_WHL_4> (default setting) to switch stance.

message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押しながら右スティックを倒す<KEYM>助真の構え中にマウス移動
message.translation: <PADM>Press and hold <KC WEAPON_MAIN>, then move the right stick<KEYM>During True Aid Stance, move the mouse</KEYM>.

message.original: 助真の構え中に<KC SHOOT>を押す
message.translation: During True Aid Stance, press <KC SHOOT>.

message.original: 味方を狙って集中しジャストタイミングで矢を放つ
message.translation: Focus concentration on allies and fire arrows with perfect timing.

message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_SUB>または<KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押しながら右スティックを倒す<KEYM>闘波／助真の構え中にマウス移動
message.translation: <PADM>Press and hold <KC WEAPON_SUB> or <KC WEAPON_MAIN>, then move the right stick<KEYM>During Seeker/True Aid Stance, move the mouse</KEYM>.

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す
message.translation: While climbing an enemy, press <KC ATTACK1>.
